data.message:
I have an individual that reviewed our Society's page in February of 2014. Giving us a low rating (*2), I contacted this individual on more than one occasion to ask for reasons he rated us so low. This is the last message in April of this year; 

"It has been more than two years since I asked what we could do to improve upon our page to improve your lone poor rating. I am requesting you justify your rating, or remove it altogether, please! I would appreciate your comments.."

He is not a follower nor a friend on the page, and will not answer any communication. What can I do to relieve this unfair review?
There is another issue I would also like to discuss about this, but would prefer to do this offline or PM. Thank you.

replies.message: Hi Clay. You can follow these instructions to report a review that doesn't follow Community Standards or focus on the product or service offered by the Page: http://bit.ly/2tmaqQg. Please keep in mind that you can only report star ratings that include reviews. -Stephanie
